title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Lessons from leaders: Turn AI agents into business value (API102)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 领导者的经验教训：将AI代理转化为业务价值 (API102)
abstract: Drive value in agentic AI with the right data and AI capabilities to extract the full potential of agents at scale. This presentation is brought to you by IBM, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 通过正确的数据和AI能力在智能体AI中创造价值，以充分发挥大规模智能体的全部潜力。本演示由AWS合作伙伴IBM为您呈现。

presenter.name: Shailender Gupta
presenter.title: Global Head - Cloud Infra, Reporting, and Analytics
